title: Above the Tree Line
description: Liv and Kai, old friends and ex-lovers who own a gift shop together, decide to play hooky on a gorgeous fall day and go for a hike up a nearby mountain. Their day off ends with physical and emotional consequences neither could’ve foreseen when the mountain they love turns deadly. Can they find their way home together? Or will it all end…above the tree line?
author: Lois Cloarec Hart
